titleStmt.title: The devil turn'd casuist, or, The cheats of Rome laid open in the exorcism of a despairing devil, at the house of Thomas Pennington in Orrel in the parish of Wigan and county of Lancaster / by Zachary Taylor ...
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Zachary, 1653-1705.
